pullRequest.title: IGNITE-12932 .NET: Add Thin Client Discovery
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add thin client discovery: clients can retrieve a list of server nodes with client connector endpoints and keep this list up to date by reacting to topology change notifications in response flags.
IEP: https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/IGNITE/IEP-44%3A+Thin+client+cluster+discovery

commit.message: Filter out client nodes and nodes without client connector
Extract ClientClusterDiscoveryTestsBase to simplify SSL tests
Add reproducer for test host process crash issue
Set NoOp failure handler for tests

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into ignite-12932

# Conflicts:

Refactor ClientClusterGroupGetNodesEndpointsResponse to return a diff based on topology versions
Refactor ClientClusterGroupGetNodesEndpointsResponse to return a diff based on topology versions
Refactor req to get a diff based on top ver
Refactor req to get a diff based on top ver
Implement connection to newly discovered nodes
Fix ClientClusterGroupGetNodeEndpointsJob to account for IgniteConfiguration.localHost
Fix ClientClusterGroupGetNodeEndpointsJob to account for IgniteConfiguration.localHost
Connect to discovered nodes within InitSocketMap

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into ignite-12932

Refactor ClientClusterGroupGetNodesEndpointsRequest to reduce allocations and complexity
